pre-tax.translation[0].definitions[0].de: pre-tax profits or losses are the profits or losses of a company before tax has been taken away
pre-tax.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a company’s pre-tax profit, loss etc is calculated before tax is taken away
pre-tax.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Latest quarter net loss of $256.7 million includes $400 million pretax restructuring charge.
